Description: Secure scalable web application infrastructure with EC2 instances in private subnets, Application Load Balancer with HTTPS-only traffic, encrypted S3 storage, comprehensive  monitoring, and DDoS protection. Implements AWS security best practices with  least privilege IAM roles, AWS Config monitoring, and multi-region backup strategy.

EnvironmentName.Description: Environment name for resource tagging and naming

EnvironmentSuffix.Description: Environment suffix for unique resource naming (used by CI/CD)

AllowedCIDR.Description: CIDR block allowed to access the application via HTTPS
AllowedCIDR.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid CIDR format (e.g., 10.0.0.0/8)

InstanceType.Description: EC2 instance type for web servers
InstanceType.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid EC2 instance type

KeyPairName.Description: Optional: EC2 Key Pair name for emergency access

MinSize.Description: Minimum number of EC2 instances in Auto Scaling Group

MaxSize.Description: Maximum number of EC2 instances in Auto Scaling Group

DesiredCapacity.Description: Desired number of EC2 instances in Auto Scaling Group

BackupRegion.Description: Region for automated backups and disaster recovery

SSLCertificateArn.Description: Optional: ARN of SSL certificate in AWS Certificate Manager for HTTPS (leave empty for HTTP-only)
SSLCertificateArn.ConstraintDescription: Must be empty or a valid ACM certificate ARN

CPUAlarmThreshold.Description: CPU utilization threshold for CloudWatch alarms (%)

EnableDetailedMonitoring.Description: Enable detailed CloudWatch monitoring for EC2 instances

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for Application Load Balancer - HTTPS only
Security group for EC2 web servers in private subnets
Security group for Bastion host (emergency access only)

SecurityGroupIngress.Description: SSH from allowed CIDR for emergency access

Properties.Description: KMS key for application data encryption

Statement.Sid: Allow S3 and CloudTrail service access

LoadBalancerURL.Description: Application Load Balancer URL (HTTPS if certificate provided, HTTP otherwise)

StaticContentBucketName.Description: S3 bucket name for static content

SecurityImplemented.Description: Security features implemented in this stack
SecurityImplemented.Value: AES-256 S3 encryption, HTTPS-only ALB, Private EC2 instances, IAM least privilege, CloudTrail logging, AWS Config monitoring, Multi-region backup, CloudWatch alarms, AWS Shield protection
